              About Tom

            Bio
            
            Tom Wheeler is a web developer and energy data analyst
            with experience building interactive dashboards and data
            visualizations in the energy, aquaculture, and agriculture
            industries. Currently developing a dashboard to calculate
            the future economic value of solar with battery projects in
            California, Tom is excited about the energy transition and
            is looking for developer/analyst positions in the energy
            industry. In his most recent role as a Software Developer
            for the Industrial Sustainability Analysis Lab, Tom advanced
            the development of a data visualization dashboard (scheduled
            for public release in summer 2023) to help international
            climate policy-makers and data center energy modelers better
            understand trends in data center energy use by the top 50+
            global technology companies.
            
            Web Apps

            Projects & Experience  
            
            
            
            
            Tools I’ve Worked With
            
            Languages & web development
            frameworks: R, R Shiny, Python, Django, JavaScript
            Modeling & analysis: Geospatial
            analysis, Seasonal decomposition, Value of information
            analysis, Energy demand analysis Currently
            (re)learning: PostgreSQL/pgAdmin
            
            Education
            
            University of California, Santa Barbara
            | Bren
            School | Santa Barbara, CA  Masters of Environmental
            Science & Management | September 2020 - June 2022
            University of California, San Diego | Data
            Science & Visualization Bootcamp | San Diego, CA
             Certificate of Completion | January 2020 - June
            2020
            Santa Clara University | Santa Clara, CA
             Bachelors of Environmental Science | September 2012 -
            June 2016

articles.title: Tom Wheeler
articles.contents:
TW
          
          
          Home
          About
          CV
          Experience & Projects
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Tom Wheeler
          
          
            
              
              
              M.S., Bren School of Environmental Science &
              Management
              
              
              University of California, Santa Barbara
              
              
              
              Software developer & energy data analyst living in San
              Diego. Currently developing a dashboard to calculate the
              value of a utility-scale front-of-meter solar energy
              generation project in CA. Tom love’s surfing, daily
              meditation, and working on his camper van.
              
              
              © Copyright 2023
